00220 /*  \brief Verify string data
00221 **  
00222 **  \par Description
00223 **       This common function performs the following evaluations:
00224 **       - Is the buffer empty? (if yes, result OK if not required)
00225 **       - Does string have a terminator? (if not, result BAD)
00226 **       - Does filename have valid chars? (only filenames tested)
00227 **
00228 **  \par Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
00229 **       (none)
00230 **       
00231 **  \param [in]  Pointer to buffer containing string
00232 **  \param [in]  Length (in bytes) of buffer
00233 **  \param [in]  Is string required or optional?
00234 **  \param [in]  Is string part of a filename? (limited chars)
00235 **
00236 **  \sa #CFS_VerifyString
00237 */
00238 boolean CFS_VerifyString(char *Buffer, int32 BufferSize,
00239                          boolean StringIsRequired, boolean NeedCharTest);
